title: Eletric Go
description:
Optimization of delivery routes using electric trucks for warehouse distribution, offering RESTful services, a user-friendly interface, and 3D visualization of the network.
It employs genetic algorithms for efficient route planning while adhering to charging rules.

title: Weather App
description: Developed a weather application that provides real-time weather data based on user location.

title: To-Do List App
description: Created a to-do list application with CRUD functionality using React and Firebase.

title: Portfolio Website
description: Designed and implemented a personal portfolio website showcasing projects, skills, and experience.

title: Blog Website
description: Developed a blog website using Django framework with user authentication and CRUD operations.
